snippet: The insurgents have increased attacks on Iranian border posts, employing methods similar to those used by Islamic State militants.
abstract: Sunni insurgents in Pakistan increase attacks on Iranian border posts, employing methods similar to those used by Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: The insurgents have increased attacks on Iranian border posts, employing methods similar to those used by Islamic State militants.

headline.main: Insurgents in Pakistan Stepping Up Iran Strikes
headline.print_headline: Insurgents in Pakistan Stepping Up Iran Strikes
